lines.text: Now this is going to be a fair trial... conducted legally. A boy's life hangs in the balance.
That's about the only place he'll hang!
You kept your money in here?

All! Was going to save to go back to China, Sheriff. In back of ironing board. Nobody bothered. Broke in wash room last night. Just find empty box! Sheriff, no money left now... money from many years.
Well, that's what we got banks for, Charlie.
[a dying man has identified Benjie as a murderer]
Dad, you can't believe what he said. You can't!
No, I believe you, Benjie, but I got to prove it. Somehow, I got to prove it.
To the people here... or to yourself?
